total_footprint_sqft.note: Above-ground only. Does not include subterranean level.

design_philosophy.summary: Space station with a parking lot - cathedral-scale volumes
design_philosophy.cultural_context: Proto-Silicon Valley tech culture in Tulsa, OK

diameter_feet.note: SCALE CORRECTION from v5. NOT 60-80 feet. This is airport terminal scale.

ceiling_height_feet.note: SCALE CORRECTION from v5. Mast height determines ceiling.

pit_depth_feet.note: Verified via escalator step count. May be conservative - actual total descent could be 15-20+ feet.
pit_depth_feet.measurement_method: 12 escalator steps × 8 inches per step = 96 inches = 8 feet

bowl_diameter_feet.note: Reactor containment zone - industrial theater aesthetic

theater_entrance_position.description: The theater entrance IS the gravitational center of the food court bowl
theater_entrance_position.visibility: Black open mouth visible at bottom of escalator descent
theater_entrance_position.source: v5/README_ARCHITECTURAL_CONTEXT.md - The Theater as Focal Void

mast_height_feet.note: SCALE CORRECTION from v5. NOT 35 feet. These are specialized tension masts for experimental engineering.

tensile_roof.mast_material: Yellow lattice steel - custom-designed for radial cable loading

cable_count.note: Counted in photos. 32-segment radial geometric subdivision.

cable_span_feet.note: SCALE CORRECTION. Matches atrium diameter - spans center to perimeter.

tensile_roof.fabric_material: White tensile fabric (Teflon-coated fiberglass or PVC-coated polyester)
tensile_roof.technology_significance: One of earliest tensile roof implementations in American retail/civic architecture

z_minus_2.name: Subterranean Access Deck (UNVERIFIED)
z_minus_2.status: PLACEHOLDER - exterior access points documented, interior off-limits

main_spine_width_feet.note: NOT standard 12-15 foot mall corridors. These are train station/airport scale.
